Articles.Content: A couple of days ago I was doing a mission to Duna in a science save when I noticed that whenever I time warped my trajectory changed. I noticed that doing a direct transfer from Kerbin to Duna caused the apoapsis of Duna to drop by 50km. Any comments on how to fix this or when it may be fixed will be greatly appreciated.
it has also happened to me if that's any help
This happens to me also, in career
The only solution I have found is don't wrap (which isn't a solution), or always plan for a mid flight course correction.

I've discovered, it only seems to happen when you use the warp here function.

Normal warp seems to be ok

On 4/29/2019 at 12:42 PM, Broke dead dogg said:

I've discovered, it only seems to happen when you use the warp here function.

Normal warp seems to be ok

Oof, that's tough. It's easy to overshoot at periapsis when the craft is moving faster, and that's not even considering fighting game lag in warp mode.
